name: Sweets Crumble
description:
Sweets Crumble

VOLUME SLIDER ON THE RIGHT!

Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Genres: Real-time Physics and Match 3

  • Click and drag a shape to fling it into shapes of the same color.  (They fling toward your mouse)
  • Completing color matches (3 shapes of the same color) scores points and increases your power meter. 
  • Flinging a shape costs power. 
  • The higher your power the more of a score multiplier you have.
  • If you run out of power you have 3 seconds to recover or you lose.
